full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHANG BLON CHEN PO RDO RJE BDUD 'DUL GYI GSHEGS GSHEGS GTOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES ZHANG BLON RDO RJE GDUNG 'DUL LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DI NI, BSTAN BSRUNG CHEN PO TSANGS PA DKAR PO'I GSUNG DANG GNAS BSGOS CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I RIGS 'KHRUNGS, ,SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO GUNG MI 'GYUR GYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, BLA MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL TSE 'DI'I LAS GA-YENG BA TSUL KHRIMS MING CAN GYI BRIS PA'I DGE BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA BAR CHAD MED PA'I SDIG SGRIB SBYANGS, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
